page.title: 16Llangyfelach Church (Contd.)
page.content:
The churchyard is very untidy with weeds arund the grave-stones.
The church is made from three kinds of stone. On the roof are greeny slates. The windows are patterned and have small panes of glass. There is a carving of St. David above the porch. He is holding a staff which has been repaired after being broken by vandals.
Inside the church is a stone cross which is one thousand years old. There is a painting by Evan Walters called 'Communion In Pentonville Prison'. There is a beautiful wooden screen near the altar.
